name: Snapdocs
headline: digital mortgage closing
description: We're building digital infrastructure and workflow tools to connect the many parties involved in real estate transactions. The result is a more digital, online, and automated process for everyone involved.
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:housing; industry:enterprise; industry:networks; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Aaron King, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Founder and Executive Chairman of Snapdocs. Happy to try to be helpful with my experience is in real estate, mortgage, networks, and building product for complex multiparty workflows. Hit me up if you're into outdoor sports, esp anything involving the ocean.

# Make mortgage a snap.
# Make mortgage a snap.
Snapdocs automates the critical interactions between lending and title companies. Save time. Save money. Give borrowers reason to celebrate.
### [![eClose-Hero-block](https://www.snapdocs.com/hubfs/eClose-Hero-block.svg)](http://snapdocs.com/<#eClosing>)
### eClosing
Digitize every loan and closing type.
### [![eVault-Hero-block-tangerine](https://www.snapdocs.com/hubfs/eVault-Hero-block-tangerine.svg)](http://snapdocs.com/<#eVault>)
### eVault
Securely store, maintain, and transfer eNotes.
### [![Notary connect-Hero-block](https://www.snapdocs.com/hubfs/Notary%20connect-Hero-block.svg)](http://snapdocs.com/<#Notary-connect>)
### Notary Connect
Connect to the nation’s largest notary network.
[ Request a Demo ](http://snapdocs.com/<https:/www.snapdocs.com/get-started>)

## Snapdocs supports 1 in 4 U.S. mortgage transactions
Previous
> “The entire Snapdocs team is truly dedicated to helping us get the most out of Notary Connect and continues to make us feel completely confident in our transition to automated processes.” 
Christine Rokusek, VP of Closing Operations ![Priority-title-1](https://www.snapdocs.com/hubfs/Priority-title-1.png)
> “Snapdocs made the process of adopting and scaling eNotes so easy and flawless. Accelerating eNote adoption eliminated signing errors, simplified the process for our post-closing team, and sped up delivery to our warehouse partners and investors.” 
Kristen Manriquez, VP of Capital Markets ![legacymutual_logo 2](https://www.snapdocs.com/hubfs/legacymutual_logo%202.png)
> “Snapdocs enables a more efficient closing process, provides better service to our valued customers, and positions us for future growth.”

### Real results, real impact
#### Increase
operational efficiency, eliminate manual tasks
#### Guarantee
secure, error-free transactions
#### Enable
seamless coordination with your partners
#### Optimize
the borrower experience
### 3X
higher eClose adoption
### Up to $500
savings per loan
### 80%
fewer closing errors
### 8 days
faster to close 
## Connecting the people, processes, and technologies that power the industry
## Essential solutions for the mortgage industry
eCLOSING
### Efficient, error-free digital closings at scale 
Standardize every loan and closing type with a single, streamlined process. Help borrowers close in under 15 minutes, so you can spend more time on what matters most.
[ Explore eClosing ](http://snapdocs.com/<https:/www.snapdocs.com/eclosing-platform>)
eVAULT
### Lock down your eNotes. Unlock seamless transfers
Confidently transfer eNotes with the only eVault designed by lenders, for lenders. Maintain the security of every promissory note. Ensure all loans are accepted by the secondary market.
[ Explore the eVault ](http://snapdocs.com/<https:/www.snapdocs.com/evault>)
NOTARY CONNECT
### A signing workflow—that actually flows
Automatically schedule high-quality notaries from the nation’s largest notary network. Deliver a perfectly coordinated loan signing experience. Accelerate your post-signing process.
[ Explore Notary Connect ](http://snapdocs.com/<https:/www.snapdocs.com/notary-connect>)
###### integrations & Partners
#### Connect your tech stack
The Snapdocs platform seamlessly integrates with any LOS, POS, and TPS solution. Explore our integrations to learn how Snapdocs streamlines your transition to digital closings—no matter who you work with.
[ Explore Integrations ](http://snapdocs.com/<https:/www.snapdocs.com/integrations>)
![Security-Mix-2](https://www.snapdocs.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Security-Mix-2.png?width=300&height=304&name=Security-Mix-2.png)
## Ready to transform your closing experience?
[ Request a Demo ](http://snapdocs.com/<>)

## Connecting the people, processes, and technologies that power the industry
## Essential solutions for the mortgage industry
eCLOSING
### Efficient, error-free digital closings at scale 
Standardize every loan and closing type with a single, streamlined process. Help borrowers close in under 15 minutes, so you can spend more time on what matters most.
 Explore eClosing ⟨4⟩
eVAULT
### Lock down your eNotes. Unlock seamless transfers
Confidently transfer eNotes with the only eVault designed by lenders, for lenders. Maintain the security of every promissory note. Ensure all loans are accepted by the secondary market.
 Explore the eVault ⟨5⟩
NOTARY CONNECT
### A signing workflow—that actually flows
Automatically schedule high-quality notaries from the nation’s largest notary network. Deliver a perfectly coordinated loan signing experience. Accelerate your post-signing process.

generated_description:
### Snapdocs Overview

**Company Name:** Snapdocs  
**Founded:** 2014  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size:** 285 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W14  
**Website:** [snapdocs.com](http://snapdocs.com)  

**Mission:** Snapdocs is on a mission to revolutionize the mortgage closing process through digital solutions. By building a more streamlined digital infrastructure, Snapdocs connects various stakeholders in real estate transactions, optimizing the experience for everyone involved—from lenders to notaries.

### How Snapdocs Works

Initially conceived to enhance real estate transactions, Snapdocs has developed a suite of **SaaS products** tailored for the mortgage industry. Their offerings include:

- **eClosing:** Provides automated and error-free digital closings.
- **eVault:** A secure platform for storing, managing, and transferring electronic notes (eNotes).
- **Notary Connect:** This tool coordinates signing appointments and streamlines settlement workflows.

With a focus on **B2B** interactions, Snapdocs serves various segments within the housing and enterprise markets, including lenders, title companies, signing services, businesses, and notaries.

### Key Features and Benefits

- **Efficiency:** Snapdocs significantly accelerates the closing process, allowing borrowers to complete closings in under 15 minutes.
- **Cost Savings:** The platform can save up to $500 per loan and reduces closing errors by 80%.
- **Integration Capabilities:** Snapdocs seamlessly integrates with multiple systems—such as Loan Origination Systems (LOS) and Point of Sale (POS)—to enhance operational efficiencies.

### Impact and Reach

Snapdocs boasts support for about **25% of all U.S. mortgage transactions**. Their technology has transformed how lenders and title companies interact, focusing on reducing manual tasks while increasing security and error-free transactions. 

### Notable Partnerships

Snapdocs has forged strategic collaborations with recognized entities in the industry, including Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, to reinforce its impact and reliability in the market.

### Testimonials

Feedback from clients underscores Snapdocs' value proposition:
- “Snapdocs made the process of adopting and scaling eNotes so easy and flawless.” — Kristen Manriquez, VP of Capital Markets.
- “The entire Snapdocs team is truly dedicated to helping us get the most out of Notary Connect.” — Christine Rokusek, VP of Closing Operations.

### Conclusion

In summary, Snapdocs is leading the charge toward digital mortgage closings, combining efficiency, security, and improved experiences for all parties involved. If you're in the mortgage industry, start exploring how Snapdocs can streamline your workflows and reduce costs. Want to see it in action? [Request a demo today!](http://snapdocs.com/)
